title: Settings
subtitle: Configure your dashboard settings

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.clearConfirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all dashboard data? This action cannot be undone.

exportDescription: Export your dashboard configuration to a file that you can import later or share with others.
exportJsonDescription: Export as JSON to save all dashboard data and configuration.
exportPdfDescription: Export as PDF to create a document of your dashboard visualizations.
exportImageDescription: Export as PNG image to share a snapshot of your dashboard.
clearDataWarning: This will delete all dashboard widgets, data sources, and configurations. This action cannot be undone.
